title: Theory-Based Learning Scenario Design: Instructional Design Utilizing Ontology Engineering

context.prior_knowledge: Understanding of foundational pedagogical theories and ontology concepts
context.additional_context: Education for pre-service and in-service teachers on ontology-based scenario authoring tools to bridge the gap between theory and practice.

learning_goals: Systematic classification and linking of diverse learning theories using the OMNIBUS ontology structure
Design of theory-standard-linked learning scenarios using the SMARTIES authoring system
It can develop standard-compliant digital learning materials applicable in real educational settings.

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
